Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel with a few faults...”

Reviews.Content: stayed sana hotel couple 5 day city break weeks ago don’t i’ve stars decent star hotel fails couple pretty basic hotel situated near main shopping ubahn subway station time letting explore city easily leisure cost €45 hotel airport taxi check fast efficient don’t expect view hotel middle residential isn’t hosts couple restaurants walking distance comfy bed glass screen separates sleeping shower toilet nice touch lack privacy issue hotel dark low lighting inside warm bedroom bar reception giving sana stars following issues bearing wish stay complimentary bottled water arrival tap water okay drink clarify hotel world travelled stayed free complimentary bottled water provided bottles water mini bar found local shop feels bit fleece option breakfast bottles water provided breakfast foc breakfast option stayed qualify average fare bit priced issue tv channels available english speaking advertised available version cnn figure current news uk options hotel limited deal breaker english language tv stations hotel options sana failing tv watch day touring catch emails web prepared pay day week wifi hotel thanks sana hotel basic issues rectified giving 4 stars instead 3 berlin fantastic visit we’ll we’d love summertime don’t we’d stay sana

Reviews.Title: “Ultramodern Experience”
Reviews.Author: j_debruyn
Reviews.Content: stayed sana five days eve choice initially booked superior eventually decided pay little extra book suite suite spacious clean modern bathroom toilets lounge deal storage space meaning dont live suitcase loved modern design impeccably clean hotel located blocks kurfurstendamm shopping precinct 10 minutes walk opposite direction gay usual bars contains range boutique shops restaurants strongly recommend restaurant called pay book advance hotel contained pool gym sauna clean modern relax busy day sightseeing complaint offer didnt contain tea coffee facilities overall definitely stay hotel return berlin
